1.4.1.name: wordpress/disable-visual-editor-wysiwyg
1.4.1.description: This plugin will disable the visual editor for selected page(s)/post(s)/custom post types. The idea behind this came after i had to keep the html intact by the tinymce editor whenever i switched back to Visual tab in the editor.
